name: Rtphplib
body:
RTPHPLib provides a class that wraps the REST API of Request Tracker.  To use, pass the URL, username, and password to the class constructor.  Then call whatever functions you want.  The RT response will be parsed into a PHP array. 

See example.php for a demonstration of common actions.

Requires the PHP curl extension.

See [the Request Tracker Wiki](http://requesttracker.wikia.com/wiki/REST) for information on available fields. Note that if a request type has mandatory fields, they are requested in the function
call, or (in certain cases) automatically added to the request.  So you don't need
to specify the ticket id in content, or the type of action.

Please report any issues at https://github.com/dersam/RTPHPLib/issues
tagline: PHP wrapper for the Request Tracker API
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
